src:
Persela Lamongan Vs Barito Putera: Nil Maizar Awasi Samsul Arif
03 Nov 2019, 17:50 by Antara, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Persela Lamongan bertekad meraih poin maksimal kala menjamu Barito Putera di laga pekan ke-27 Liga 1 Indonesia. Kedua kesebelasan dijadwalkan bertemu pada Senin, 4 November 2019 di Stadion Surajaya, Kabupaten Lamongan, Jawa Timur.
Pelatih Persela Nil Maizar mengatakan akan mewaspadai beberapa pemain andalan Barito. Secara khusus ia mengawasi dua mantan pemainnya yang kini berseragam Barito, yakni Samsul Arif dan Kosuke Yamazaki. "Kedua pemain itu akan kami antisipasi sebab mereka adalah pemain kunci dari Barito Putera," kata Nil Maizar, Minggu, 3 November 2019.
Laga antara Persela melawan Barito diperkirakan bakal terbuka. Sebab, kedua tim tengah berburu poin untuk menjauh dari zona degradasi.
Nil Maizar menyatakan sudah meminta para pemain agar bekerja keras di laga nanti. Ia berharap hasil imbang dari Bali United bisa membawa kemenangan di laga kandang nanti. "Kami akan mengusung spirit perlawanan dalam menjamu tim tamu Barito Putera," kata dia.
Jelang pertandingan, Nil mengakui dari sisi teknik pemainnya masih mempunyai kelemahan. Ia menyoroti salah satu kelemahan Persela ialah dalam penyelesaian akhir. Namun ia optimistis hal itu masih bisa diperbaiki.
"Kami sudah melakukan banyak perubahan termasuk berkomunikasi dengan Alex dos Santos. Sebagai pemain asing tuntutan dari penonton itu harus memberikan kontribusi bagus. Sesuai kapasitasnya, karena pemain asing direkrut untuk itu. Mudah-mudahan dia bisa kasih yang terbaik," kata Nil Maizar.
text:
Persela Lamongan Vs Barito Putera: Nil Maizar Oversees Samsul Arif
03 Nov 2019, 17:50 by Antara, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Persela Lamongan is determined to win maximum points when entertaining Barito Putera in the 27th week of League 1 Indonesia. The two teams are scheduled to meet on Monday, November 4, 2019 at Surajaya Stadium, Lamongan Regency, East Java.
Persela coach Nil Maizar said he would be on the lookout for some of Barito's best players. In particular he oversees two of his former players who are now in Barito uniforms, namely Samsul Arif and Kosuke Yamazaki. "We will anticipate these two players because they are the key players of Barito Putera," Nil Maizar said on Sunday, November 3, 2019.
The match between Persela against Barito is expected to be open. Therefore, both teams are hunting for points to stay away from the relegation zone.
Nil Maizar said he had asked the players to work hard in the match later. He hopes a draw from Bali United can bring victory at home games later. "We will carry the spirit of resistance in entertaining the visiting team of Barito Putera," he said.
Ahead of the match, Nile admitted that in terms of technique his players still had weaknesses. He highlighted one of Persela's weaknesses in the final settlement. But he is optimistic that it can still be fixed.
"We have made many changes including communicating with Alex dos Santos. As a foreign player the demands of the audience must make a good contribution. According to his capacity, because foreign players are recruited for it. Hopefully he can love the best," said Nil Maizar.
